» Geometry » Classical Geometry » Other Plane Curves
Classic Spirals
Archimedean Spiral $\,\,\,r=a\theta$
Logarithmic Spiral $\,\,\,r=e^{a\theta}$
Hyperbolic Spiral $\,\,\,r=\frac{a}{\theta}$
Galileo's Spiral $\,\,\,r=a-b\theta^2$
Poinsot's Spiral $\,\,\,r=\frac{a}{\cosh(\theta)}$
Fermat's Spiral $\,\,\,r=a\sqrt{\theta}$
Cochleoid Spiral $\,\,\,r=a\frac{\sin(\theta)}{\theta}$
